name: Coloring for Adults
description:
Relaxing adult coloring book with beautiful pictures and gorgeous colors.

Our adult coloring book comes with 550+ beautiful and highly detailed professional pictures for you to be creative with.
Mindful coloring is a great way to relax and be creative with a quick five minute fix, or for many hours of pleasure.

Floral pictures, animals, and sea creatures are ready to be colored in by you. Take as long as you like to perfect your creation, or maybe just a quick dab and share to impress your friends!

You can fill with a tap, or paint with strokes. There is an unlimited color palette to choose from, and different brush widths available.

If you make a mistake, unlike a book, just undo it and carry on. Or simply rub out the bits you don't want.

There are plenty of free pictures to try, with all features enabled, and no time limits to worry about.

Coloring for Adults is suitable for all ages.

Features:
- 550+ high definition pictures
- 60+ free pictures
- iPad support
- flood fill mode to tap and fill
- brush mode to draw freehand
- large range of brush widths
- unlimited palettes
- undo feature
- eraser
- color pipette for easy color matching
- fully enabled features for all users, to try before you buy
